moves.1. e4 e6 2. Nf3 d5 3. e5 c5 4. d4 cxd4 5: Oh great.  He just blunders away a pawn.
moves.7... Nxe5 8. c3 h6 9. Bf4: Qc7 would just walk into a pin.
moves.9... Ne5g6: Black is much better here.  Moving either knight to g6 or c6 was O.K.
moves.10. Nab5: Oh great.  He just blunders away a piece.
moves.10... Nxf4 11. Nd6+: Oh great.  He just blunders away another piece.
moves.11... Qxd6 12. Nb5 Qe5+ 13. Be2 Nxg2+: Bd7 and a6 are about the same.
moves.14. Kf1 Nf4 15. Qa4: Oh great.  He blunders away his king.
